bibl.title: Memoranda found for last page of Ramsey Day Book 1865

projectDesc.p: Machine-readable transcription created for the University of Tennessee Libraries Special Collections.

editorialDecl.p: Errors in transcription of the printed text not controlled.
Editorial tags limited to gap and unclear.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

keywords.term: Ramsey, J. G. M., (James Gettys McGready), 1797-1884
Confederate States of America. Dept. of the Treasury.
East Tennessee and Georgia Railroad Company

revisionDesc.change: Approximate date of original transcription and transcriber.
Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: Memoranda found last page of J. C. Ramsey & s Day Book.
" Rent of Post Office from Sep. 17. 1863 to Dec. 19. 1866 three years three months & six days at one thousand dollars per year-in all $3,266.62. Made application for that amt. to P.O. Department "
Lee Brownlow, Whig 7th of Nov. 1864 Apr. 8. 1865. "
